title: Which gas value decreases upon cooling

content.description: A sample of an ideal gas is cooled from 50.0oC to 25.0oC in a sealed container of constant volume. Which of the following values for the gas will decrease?
content.question: I. The average molecular mass of the gasII. The average distance between the moleculesIII. The average speed of the molecules

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
